protocol.name: P-GSE13881-2
protocol.text: Seedlings were treated with 10 micromolar Dexamethasone during one hour in liquid MS medium, and during 1 more hour with 50 micromolar IAA.

protocol.name: P-GSE13881-3
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown on half-strength Murashige-Skoog (MS) media containing 1% sucrose and 0.8% Daichin Agar in a 16 hour light / 8 hour dark cycle at 23 degrees.

protocol.name: P-GSE13881-4
protocol.text: Purified total RNA was isolated using Qiagen RNEasy columns

protocol.name: P-GSE13881-5
protocol.text: cRNA synthesis and labeling was done according to Schmid et al., Nature Genetics [2005] 37, 501-506

protocol.name: P-GSE13881-6
protocol.text: Hybridisation of 15ug cRNA was done overnight for 16 hours at 45ÂºC in a Hybridisation Oven 640 (Affymetrix). The protocol is conducted as described in the Genechip Expression Analysis Technical Manual, section 2 (Eukaryotic Sample and Array Processing), chapter 2 (Eukaryotic Target Hybridization) (P/N 701027, revision 5).

protocol.name: P-GSE13881-7
protocol.text: Arrays were scanned on an Affymetrix 3000 7G scanner, as described n the Genechip Expression Analysis Technical Manual, section 2 (Eukaryotic Sample and Array Processing), chapter 2 (Eukaryotic Arrays: Washing, Staining and Scanning (P/N 701028, revision 5).

protocol.name: P-GSE13881-8
protocol.text: Expression estimates were calculated using GCRMA
